defaultReportOptions.toolTipText: Content that includes sexual, predatory, or abusive communications towards minors
Content that is intended to recruit for terrorist organizations, incite violence, glorify terrorist attacks, or otherwise promote acts of terrorism
Content that threatens individuals or targets them with prolonged or malicious insults
Content that is misleading or deceptive with serious risk of egregious harm

videoReportOptions.toolTipText: Content that is violent, graphic, or posted to shock viewers
Content that promotes hatred against protected groups, abuses vulnerable individuals, or engages in cyberbullying
Content that is massively posted or otherwise misleading in nature
Copyright, privacy, or other legal complaints
